title: Bibacillin 1: A two-component lantibiotic from Bacillus thuringiensis
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00192C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ryan Moreira, Yi Yang, Youran Luo, Michael S. Gilmore, Wilfred A van der Donk
Here we describe bibacillin 1 – a two-component lantibiotic from Bacillus thuringiensis. The peptides that comprise bibacillin 1 are modified by a class II lanthipeptide synthetase BibM producing two peptides...
